com.camerontec.catalys.util.configuration.event

Class ConfigurationEventPublisher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.util.configuration.event.ConfigurationEventPublisher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IConfigurationEventListener, IConfigurationEventSource

    public class ConfigurationEventPublisher
extends Object
implements IConfigurationEventSource, IConfigurationEventListener
    This class acts as both an IConfigurationEventSource and an IConfigurationEventListener. This allows it to be used as an aggregator of events from multiple sources.

      • addListener

        public void addListener(IConfigurationEventListener listener,
                        IConfigurationEventFilter filter)
        Description copied from interface: IConfigurationEventSource
        Add a listener to configuration events fired by this object.
        Specified by:
        addListener in interface IConfigurationEventSource
        Parameters:
        listener - The IConfigurationEventListener that will be invoked on each event matching the given filter
        filter - An event filter. Only events matching this filter will be delivered. A null value turns off the filtering.

      • removeListener

        public void removeListener(IConfigurationEventListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: IConfigurationEventSource
        Remove a listener of configuration events. The listener will no longer be invoked on events.
        Specified by:
        removeListener in interface IConfigurationEventSource
        Parameters:
        listener - The IConfigurationEventListener to remove
